SMS_SendTXTSMS: select TXT_TVAL,TXT_VAL,TXT_BCC from jsharmony.TXT where TXT_PROCESS='SMS' and TXT_ATTRIB=@TXT_ATTRIB
X_SMLW_TOP: select case when @cur_sm_id_auto <> 0 then @cur_sm_id_auto else (select top 1 sm_id_auto from jsharmony.sm where 1=1 order by sm_utype desc,coalesce(SM.SM_Seq,SM.SM_ID),SM_Name,SM.SM_ID) end as sm_id_auto from jsharmony.dual
X_SMLW_INSERT: where coalesce(sm_seq,sm_id) > (select coalesce(sm_seq,sm_id) from jsharmony.sm where sm_id=@sm_id_parent)
and sm_utype = (select sm_utype from jsharmony.sm where sm_id=@sm_id_parent)

and cast((coalesce(sm_seq,sm_id)-(select coalesce(sm_seq,sm_id) from jsharmony.sm where sm_id=@sm_id_parent)) as decimal)/(select count(*) from jsharmony.sm sm2 where coalesce(sm2.sm_seq,sm2.sm_id) > (select coalesce(sm_seq,sm_id) from jsharmony.sm where sm_id=@sm_id_parent) and coalesce(sm2.sm_seq,sm2.sm_id) <= coalesce(sm.sm_seq,sm.sm_id))<=1.0;
select (select max(sm_id)+1 from jsharmony.SM),sm_id,sm_utype,coalesce(sm_seq,sm_id)+1,@sm_name,@sm_desc,'ACTIVE' from jsharmony.SM where sm_id=@sm_id_parent;
